explains: n. 幕间休息；暂停；中断

sentences.en: After intermission, the second band played.
sentences.cn: 幕间休息后第二支乐队开始演奏。

sentences.en: Coffee was served during the intermission.
sentences.cn: 幕间休息时有咖啡供应。

sentences.en: This state of affairs lasted without intermission for a hundred years.
sentences.cn: 这种局面从未间断地持续了一百年。
